definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: These ones were very similar to Xiao Lung Bao in that there was a delicious soup inside.
sentences.chinese: 跟小笼包一样，生煎包里也包裹着香浓又美味的汤。

sentences.english: Xiaolongbao will the first dim sum to be included on the list.
sentences.chinese: 小笼包会是最先被列入名单的点心。

sentences.english: I recommend you Xiaolong Dumpling, it's very famous in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐你小笼包子，它在上海非常有名。

sentences.english: We are full now. Could you cancel the Pork Ravioli please?
sentences.chinese: 我们已经吃饱了，您能帮我们取消无锡小笼包么？

sentences.english: Where can you get authentic steamed meat dumplings ?
sentences.chinese: 在哪里可以吃到正宗的小笼包？

sentences.english: Changzhou people know that eating dumplings to go to "welcome the Gui."
sentences.chinese: 常州人都知道，吃小笼包要到“迎桂”。

sentences.english: Nanxiang Shanghai dumplings are a hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 上海的南翔小笼包有百年历史。

definition: shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
wonton/see also 餛飩|馄饨[hun2 tun5]
